title: How do you create several guidelines across a whole font in Fontlab?
content: How do you do put several different horizontal guidelines across the whole font in Fontlab?
author: djnippa

comments.content:
Drag as many as you want from the ruler, then on each one do a right-click and "Convert to Global" (in the Guides layer).

hhp

Or just hold the shift key down when you drag the guide out from the ruler.
